location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 14. MAP TO ILLUSTRATE THE ACTION OF SHAIKH SAAD. 6th. - 9th. January, 1916.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 257 x 231mm, on sheet 338 x 307mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume II, and shows a stretch of the River Tigris to the east of Shaikh Saad [Shaykh Saâ€˜d] in central and eastern Iraq, indicating the location of trenches, a boat bridge and watercourses.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1924.
